Package Accessories

Class GraphBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • Accessories.GraphBuilder
  • public class GraphBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    this class represent the building pathes procces. for each fruit we build target object and find the minimum path to it. this class is being called every time fruit is eaten to find the new minimum path in accordance the new location of the player
